statements: UPDATE stock_market_data SET open_price = 100.50, close_price = 102.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-03-15';
UPDATE stock_market_data SET high_price = 105.20, low_price = 98.60, volume = 50000 WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND date = '2022-03-16';
UPDATE stock_market_data SET open_price = 100.25, close_price = 105.50 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2021-07-15';
UPDATE stock_market_data SET volume = 50000, high_price = 110.75, low_price = 98.30 WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOG' AND date = '2021-08-20';
UPDATE stock_data SET open_price=500.25, close_price=510.50 WHERE stock_symbol='AAPL' AND date='2022-09-30';
UPDATE stock_trends SET trend_type='Bullish', end_date='2022-10-15', start_date='2022-09-01' WHERE stock_symbol='GOOGL' AND trend_id=123;
UPDATE stock_data SET open_price = 100.50, close_price = 105.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-10';
UPDATE stock_trends SET trend_type = 'Bullish', end_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND trend_id = 12;
UPDATE stock_data SET open_price = 1000.00 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE investment_decisions SET amount = 5000.00, action = 'BUY' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE stock_data SET close_price = 1000.00 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE investment_decisions SET amount = 5000.75, action = 'SELL' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE StockData SET stock_price = 100.50, stock_volume = 500 WHERE stock_id = 1;
UPDATE InvestmentDecisions SET decision_date = '2022-01-15', decision_value = 2000.75 WHERE decision_id = 3;
UPDATE StockData SET stock_price = 150.50, stock_volume = 1000 WHERE stock_id = 1;
UPDATE InvestmentDecisions SET decision_value = 200.75, decision_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE stock_id = 2;
UPDATE stock_prices SET price = 150.50 WHERE stock_id = 1;
UPDATE stock_transactions SET quantity = 100, price = 200.75 WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE stock_prices SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE stock_id = 1;
UPDATE stock_transactions SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.05 WHERE stock_id = 5 AND transaction_type = 'BUY';
